website_summaries.verdict: Choose this inexpensive TV if you don't need smart technology and don't have room for a large screen. A good choice for guest bedrooms.
pros: Smaller screen won't take up too much space in small rooms
Very easy to set up and use
cons: It's refurbished, but it's also tested and certified
No smart technology, but this won't bother those who prefer standard models

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I gave this tv as a Christmas gift to an older lady. She called to tell me she loves it and that the picture quality is excellent even though she needs cataract surgery. This was a great choice for the money and it arrived several days before schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good picture
customer_reviews.text: It does everything that a TV should do. Good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV!  Terrific Price and my Rescue dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a TLC TV from Amazon. After 6 years it no longer turned on. I didn't need a Smart TV as this is entertainment for my Rescue pups. They are much calmer with noise in the background and don't bark at everything and anything going on outside. Seller was excellent and shipping was quick! Highly recommend this TV and Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, lightweight, 3 HDMI ports, good helpful instructions. Worth the price. Roku, dvd, cable tv, all working. Nice picture. Use the remote codes provided.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but has it where it counts.
customer_reviews.text: 2 Stars for features because it has ARC and Toslink audio out, but no more because it has no external buttons, yes, none. But I didn't buy it for gizmos. 5 stars for pic quality because there isn't 4 1/2 stars. It really is as good as the best budget TV's in this size range that I have/had(TCL, Emerson). One Star for the remote, they really don't get any more boring or unfriendly that this lump. The pic quality/cost ratio makes it a solid 4 star unit. Note; The feet are way out on the ends, so you better have a wide surface for it to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: motomech

customer_reviews.title: Sharp TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV! I mostly use mine for console gaming, but TV shows and videos are great on it too. The sound is amazing (especially considering that my old TV had a blown speaker when I bought it). Picture is crystal clear. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: SilentNinja2930

product_meta.title: Sharp 40" class Q3000 (39.6" diag.) FHD TV (LC-40Q3000U)
product_meta.description: Perfectly sized for any room, this Sharp 40" Class FHD (1080P) LED TV (LC-40Q3000U) enables you to enjoy content via a high-def link to your smartphone or tablet. And for even more options, there’s a USB media player for watching HD movies.
